channel.title: Added dclaws how do i make them work
channel.description: ok fixxed the first problem but now i have another i made the d claws but how do i make them so the equip and stay equiped? like so i can fight with them?

item.title: Added dclaws how do i make them work
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

edit them in item.cfg then go to client.java servh for “getwepanim” and copy and past one of the codes should look somthing like this if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) //(this isthe wepon id) { return 1658; //(this is the emote id) }
then edit the wepon id to d clawz and edid the return 1658 to the emote you want it to attack like

Read full topic
item.source: Added dclaws how do i make them work
